TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content:
DPG, you are hearby fined five credits for violation of the Crysis suit quotes code.

...what?

Did I unknowingly reference something again?

Maybe ....

Bummer, a suprise Friday afternoon (EST) launch would be a weekend waster, not going to happen, or ....
They're going to release 0.25 during the Squadcast. It would be the ultimate troll, everyone is watching the stream and nobody realizes that Steam is downloading something...

...what?

Did I unknowingly reference something again?

NNNNNNNRNNNNNNNN

John Spartan, you are hereby fined five credits for the violation of not getting Demolition Man references.

NNNNNNNRNNNNNNNN

John Spartan, you are hereby fined five credits for the violation of not getting Demolition Man references.

I never liked that film, though Wesley Snipes' hair was on point.
The HypePlane is entirely 1st class. Also, one-million-track drifting. Also, good seats for the Squadcast.

A demolition man reference to combat a crysis statement - the cryosuit when put in a certain mode says "Maximum power"

(Unless I had a moment and screwed it completely, in which case I'm at fault, it's been a really long day, and it isn't over yet.)
Oh squadcast shall make it or break it today!
Can I still buy a ticket? Or do I need to buy KAS ?
who wants to hitchike on my hype bus? and pay no attention to the man in the hazmat suit making the blue substance in the bathroom, that's completely normal.

Countdown

I hope this works

Countdown

I hope this works

Works just fine!

Eh, timeanddate used to be good for making countdowns, but I don't really like it anymore. I wish there was some website where I could make a fullscreen dramatic countdown with no ads, red numbers, and Portal 2 Announcer voice effects

Countdown

I hope this works

YES!!!

Also, check out my playlist if you want to get hyped up!!!!

EDIT: Also, 50th post. I feel so proud.

Edited September 26, 2014 by Lhathron the Elf
Staying up till past midnight for this!

Well it's Saturday morning and still two hours to go.

grumble grumble timezones grumble.

Why do you guys live far in the past, get with the times!

Give me it TODAY YO

I will be busy the next few days and WANT IT NOW 80
Anyone else find it strange that steamDB hasn't been updated in a day? They had pretty regular updates until today.

Anyone else find it strange that steamDB hasn't been updated in a day? They had pretty regular updates until today.

Attention passengers, turbulence is expected due to this revelation, and will continue throughout the Squadcast. Please check your seatbelts. Thank you.
